title-part.text: PROCESSES FOR THE ELECTROLYTIC OR ELECTROPHORETIC PRODUCTION OF COATINGS

note.note-paragraph:
The following IPC groups are not in the CPC scheme. The subject matter for these IPC groups is classified in the following CPC groups:
C25D2/00 covered by B23K28/006
C25D5/24 covered by C25D5/34
C25D5/26 covered by C25D5/36
C25D5/28 covered by C25D5/38
C25D5/30 covered by C25D5/42, C25D5/44
C25D5/32 covered by C25D5/46
C25D19/00 covered by C25D17/00
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

CPC-specific-text.text: Nanostructures, e.g. using aluminium anodic oxidation templates [AAO]

title-part.text: Perforated or foraminous objects, e.g. sieves
Separation of the formed objects from the electrodes

CPC-specific-text.text: with no destruction of said electrodes

title-part.text: characterised by the organic bath constituents used
from baths containing acetylenic or heterocyclic compounds
characterised by the organic bath constituents used
characterised by the organic bath constituents used
characterised by the organic bath constituents used
of metals not provided for in groups C25D3/04 - C25D3/50

CPC-specific-text.text: containing more than 50% by weight of iron or nickel or cobalt
containing more than 50% by weight of zinc
containing more than 50% by weight of platinum group metals

title-part.text: containing more than 50% by weight of copper
containing more than 50% by weight of tin
containing more than 50% by weight of gold
containing more than 50% by weight of silver

note.note-paragraph:
Group C25D5/00 is impacted by reclassification into groups C25D5/60, C25D5/605, C25D5/611, C25D5/615, C25D5/617, C25D5/619, C25D5/623, C25D5/625, C25D5/627, and C25D5/67.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: Electroplating using gases, e.g. pressure influence
Electroplating with applied electromagnetic field, not locally, e.g. for plating magnetic layers

note.note-paragraph:
Group C25D5/006 is no longer used for the classification of documents as of 2020-08-01.
The content of this group is being reclassified into groups C25D5/007, C25D5/009, C25D5/011, and C25D5/013.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: Electroplating using magnetic fields, e.g. magnets

Groups C25D5/006 and C25D5/009 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.
